input.sentences: we were on the bike trail for a competition called trail trek
i flipped my friend off because i was too tired to have my picture taken .
we stopped at a checkpoint to get some water .
we laid down in the grass for a while .
output.sentences: A trail trek competition starts at the yellow sign.
I took a picture of my friend and he looked very tired
At the checkpoint, he decided to stop for some water
They saw the gree grass and laid there for a little while.
The Blues van was parked at the finish line.
